QuestData.Title: A Taste For Tail
QuestData.Description: It could be days before we're ready to make our way to the surface, and to be honest, I'm already beginning to get hungry.$b$bI hate to be picky, but when it comes to seafood, I'm afraid there are very few things I can stomach.$b$bIf you come across any lobster types, I would happily pay you what coin I have with me for their tails.
QuestData.LogDescription: Adarrah wants you to bring her 4 Clacksnap Tails.
QuestData.CompletionText: Oh, please tell me you were able to find me some food, $c.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, my!$b$bThat's some of the biggest, juiciest tail I've ever seen!
